# 巨人的工具

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jurende-gongju
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jurende-gongju
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jurende-gongju
jurende-gongju <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jurende-gongju
jurende-gongju <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
